sentences.en: A useless or worthless byproduct, as from a manufacturing process.
sentences.cn: 废品生产过程中等产生的无用或无价值之副产品.

sentences.en: Anti - malaria drugs were by - keeping work by keeping the parasite from neutralizing a toxic byproduct of digestion.
sentences.cn: 抗 疟疾药物通过防止寄生菌中和出有毒的消化副产品而起效.

sentences.en: As a kind of byproduct of the botanical pesticide, the seed cake was value in use.
sentences.cn: 作为植物源杀虫剂的副产品, 苦皮藤籽粕具有开发利用价值.

sentences.en: As they eat the nitrates they form nitrites as an intermediate chemical byproduct.
sentences.cn: 当他们吸收这些硝酸盐的时候,会形成一种可以成为副产物的亚硝酸盐的中间产物.

sentences.en: Becoming a baseball fan was a byproduct of my research into sport on TV.
sentences.cn: 我成了棒球迷,是研究电视体育节目的副作用.

sentences.en: Cotton's byproduct is good feedstuff resource for livestock.
sentences.cn: 棉花副产品是饲喂牲畜很好的饲料资源.

sentences.en: Crude benzene is byproduct in the production of coke.
sentences.cn: 粗苯是焦炭生产的副产品.

sentences.en: Except byproduct of HDPE, thermal stability of other various brands polyethylene waxes is excellent.
sentences.cn: 除HDPE低分子物外, 各种牌号的聚乙烯蜡热稳定性能良好.

sentences.en: Pationce is a byproduct of tribulations; It isn't granted, it is learned.
sentences.cn: 耐心是磨难的副产品, 不是给予的, 必须自己学会经历.

sentences.en: Refinery and petrochemical operation produce a variety of byproduct gases.
sentences.cn: 炼油厂和石油化工生产中生成各种副产气体.

sentences.en: Spent Potlining ( SPL ) is the byproduct waste of electrolytic aluminum industry.
sentences.cn: 铝电解槽废旧阴极碳(SpentPotlining 简称 SPL ) 是铝电解工业产生的废料之一.

sentences.en: Sugar and its byproduct are the basis of the island's economy.
sentences.cn: 糖及其副产品是这个岛国经济的基础.

sentences.en: The byproduct of petroleum industry - hard pitch andphysical and chemical properties are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种在石油加工过程中产生的特殊副产物 - 硬沥青.

sentences.en: The chief byproduct of combustion is silicon dioxide ( sand ).
sentences.cn: 燃烧的主要副产品是二氧化硅 ( 沙 ).

sentences.en: The raw material for the tyre is a byproduct of oil refining.
sentences.cn: 这种轮胎的原料是汽油提炼的副产品。

sentences.en: There's also dioxin, a byproduct of paper manufacture and waste incineration.
sentences.cn: 还有二恶英, 纸生产和废物燃烧的副产物.

trans.tran_cn: 副产品，意外结果，副作用
trans.tran_en: A byproduct is something that is produced during the manufacture or processing of another product
